Document.name: FindFirst
Document.summary: Find the first position that the sub string appears in a text.
Document.returns: Returns a pair of numbers, the first number indicating the position in the text, the second number indicating the size of the equivalence sub string in the text.
Document.param: The text to find the sub string.
Flags controlling how to normalize a string.
Document.remarks: For any normalization that is not None, the found sub string could be different to the string you want to find.
